blogPost.excerpt: Textcraft is a magical utility for iPhone, iPad, and Mac that allows you to transform any text in real-time into a variety of 80+ different formats.
blogPost.body: Textcraft is a magical utility for iPhone, iPad, and Mac that allows you to transform any text in real-time into a variety of 80+ different formats.
blogPost.title: Textcraft - Magic text transformations
blogPost.author: JPEGuin

localize.description: Textcraft是一款适用于iPhone、iPad和Mac的神奇实用程序，允许您将任何文本实时转换为各种80多种不同的格式。
Textcraft是一款適用於iPhone、iPad和Mac的神奇實用程序，允許您將任何文本實時轉換爲各種80多種不同的格式。

previous.excerpt: Transcribe your YouTube video in one click and highlight the important stuff for easy and quick reading. you-tldr let's you skim through the video transcript and skip to the good stuff. You can also download the transcript for your records.
previous.title: you-tldr - Get the tldr of any YouTube video in seconds

localize.description: 只需单击一下即可转录您的YouTube视频，并突出显示重要内容，以便轻松快速阅读。你-tldr让我们先浏览一下视频记录，然后跳到好的部分。您也可以下载文字记录作为您的记录。
localize.tagline: 在几秒钟内获得任何YouTube视频的tldr

localize.description: 只需單擊一下即可轉錄您的YouTube視頻，並突出顯示重要內容，以便輕鬆快速閱讀。你-tldr讓我們先瀏覽一下視頻記錄，然後跳到好的部分。您也可以下載文字記錄作爲您的記錄。
localize.tagline: 在幾秒鐘內獲得任何YouTube視頻的tldr

next.excerpt: Fundraising Hours is an effortless office hour event connecting early-stage founders fundraising remotely. The founders can get notified when the investors open their office hours. Powered by Remotehour.
next.title: Fundraising Hours - Remotely connecting founders with committed investors

localize.description: 筹款时间是一项毫不费力的办公时间活动，将早期创始人远程筹款联系起来。当投资者开放办公时间时，创始人可以得到通知。由RemoteHour提供动力。
localize.tagline: 远程连接创始人与忠诚的投资者

localize.description: 籌款時間是一項毫不費力的辦公時間活動，將早期創始人遠程籌款聯繫起來。當投資者開放辦公時間時，創始人可以得到通知。由RemoteHour提供動力。
localize.tagline: 遠程連接創始人與忠誠的投資者
